name: rexlimdvaacbv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: syl5bi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2, wrex(s1, c0, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s1, c0, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s1, c0, w3), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s1, c0, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s1, c0, w3), w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s1, c0, w3))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w3)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s1, c0, w3), w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w3)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s1, c0, w3), w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3)), w2)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w3)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3)), w2)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w2)

comment: Unpack a restricted existential antecedent while changing the variable with implicit substitution. The equivalent of this theorem without the bound variable change is ~ rexlimdvaa . (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
